name: Horror Rollercoaster
description: Looking to get scared at high speeds? Look no further! This rollercoaster game will take your breath away!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 201 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
